The cmvnorm package for the complex multivariate Gaussian distribution has been introduced and
motivated. The Gaussian process has been generalized to the complex case, and a complex generaliza-
tion of the emulator technique has been applied to an analytic function of several complex variables.
The complex variance matrix was specified using a novel parameterization which accommodated
non-real covariances in the context of circulary symmetric random variables. Further work might
include numerical support for the complex multivariate Student t distribution.
